dialogues.JUDGE:
[1]Quiet in the courtroom! Court is now in session! 
[2]Mrs. Sutphin, I SAID QUIET! You are accused of mass murder! This is a court of law, not a coffee klatch! Mr. Nazlerod, your opening statement. 
[3]Mrs. Sutphin, a defendant who has herself for a lawyer has a fool for a client... Approach the bench! 
[4]Mrs. Sutphin, I have no legal choice but to allow you to take over as your own attorney. 
[5]How do you plead? 
[6]Sustained. Watch your mouth, Mrs. Hinkle. 
[7]I'm warning you, Mrs. Hinkle. One more obscenity and I'll charge you with contempt of court. 
[8]Mrs. Hinkle, I find you guilty of contempt of court and sentence you to a thousand dollar fine and five days in jail! Lock 'er up! 
[9]You may answer. 
[10]The jury is instructed to ignore the outburst of the witness. 
[11]Huh?...oh yeah...YES.
